text.__SUMMARY__:
Hibbertia acrotrichion is small shrub in the Dilleniaceae family that is native to Western Australia.The dwarf shrub has an erect habit and can grow to a height of 0.15 to 0.3 m (5.9 in to 11.8 in). It blooms between August and September producing yellow flowers
The species is only found in a small area long the south coast of Western Australia around Jerramungup where it grows in stony to sandy soils.
